character.age: 25 years old, with an ageless spirit
character.background: Born to a family of skilled thieves and assassins. Kaelin was trained from a young age in the art of stealth and deception. They have honed their skills on the streets of a vast and corrupt city, earning the title of Erebus-001.
character.place_of_birth: The Undercity, a network of hidden tunnels and sewers beneath the city of Tenebrous
